chart_description: This chart provides information about the memory usage of dictionary data structures, which are used to store variable-length key-value pairs.

dimension_descriptions.data: Indicates the type of memory being used: physical, virtual, shared, or active.
dimension_descriptions.index: Indicates the index of the dictionary that is being monitored.
dimension_descriptions.structures: Indicates the type of dictionary structure being used: radix, rrd, or tree.
